Estimator Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for Estimator:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for estimation of various stochastic properties.

Estimates various properties of stochastic variables (like mean, variance, density). An estimator receives a source of the type Stochastic, of which it receives the data during every step (every time step() is called).
